targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  1000*price as price
FROM auction_results
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sum(bio) AS "bio",
  sum(wind) AS "wind",
  sum(solar) AS "solar",
  sum(coal) AS "coal",
  sum(lignite) AS "lignite",
  sum(gas) AS "gas",
  sum(water) AS "water",
  sum(storage) AS "storage",
  sum(nuclear) AS "nuclear"
FROM capacities
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  agent NOT LIKE 'dem_de%'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  volume AS "market volume"
FROM auction_results
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sum(power) AS "demand"
FROM demand
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sum(total) AS "generation"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sum(nuclear) AS "nuclear",
  sum(coal) AS "coal",
  sum(water) AS "water",
  sum(bio) AS "bio",
  sum(gas) AS "gas",
  sum(lignite) AS "lignite",
  sum(wind) AS "wind",
  sum(solar) AS "solar"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sum(nuclear) + sum(coal) +  sum(water) + sum(bio) + sum(gas) + sum(lignite) + sum(wind) + sum(solar) as "total"
FROM capacities
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  avg(temp_air-273.15) AS "temp_air",
  avg(ghi) AS "ghi"
FROM cosmo
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  country = 'DE'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  avg(SQRT(POWER(wind_meridional,2)+POWER(wind_zonal,2))) AS "wind_speed"
FROM cosmo
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sum(nuclear) AS "nuclear",
  sum(coal) AS "coal",
  sum(water) AS "water",
  sum(bio) AS "bio",
  sum(gas) AS "gas",
  sum(lignite) AS "lignite",
  sum(wind) AS "wind",
  sum(solar) AS "solar"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'optimize_dayAhead'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  agent AS metric,
  sum(lignite) AS "lignite",
  sum(gas) AS "gas",
  sum(nuclear) AS "nuclear",
  sum(coal) AS "coal"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'post_dayAhead' AND
  agent = '$agent'
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  agent AS metric,
  sum(lignite) AS "lignite",
  sum(gas) AS "gas",
  sum(nuclear) AS "nuclear",
  sum(coal) AS "coal"
FROM generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  step = 'optimize_dayAhead' AND
  agent LIKE 'pwp_de%' AND
  total > 30
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2
